long_description: as hvacr and electrical instructors, we know a lot about our subject but sometimes have trouble keeping the focus and interest of our visual-learning students. refrigeration training services (rts) instructor cds are animated powerpoint presentations of equipment and components designed to help instructors show the subject matter in an interesting and dynamic way; which increases learning and makes teaching easier. rts instructor cds are helping hvacr students and technicians learn better through schools, contractors, and distributorships in more than 44 states as well as canada, australia, barbados, and south korea.

generated_description: hvac teaching, based in clifton, virginia, specializes in providing animated powerpoint presentation resources for hvacr (heating, ventilation, air conditioning, and refrigeration) instructors. founded in 2001 by dick and irene wirz, the company offers a range of instructional materials including a/c & refrigeration systems, hvacr electrical systems, and nate test prep resources. these resources are designed to enhance teaching effectiveness by incorporating visual elements and allowing instructors to customize presentations to focus on specific lesson content. hvac teaching serves hvacr students and technicians across multiple states in the united states, as well as in canada, australia, barbados, and south korea.
